about.t10: I am Mauricio Ocando, I am 22 years old and I am a developer focused on Front-End although I also have knowledge about Back-end, I am a person with a high capacity for adaptability, fast learning and I focus on building beautiful interfaces and incredible user experiences that make you fall in love and catch you at first sight, I have a good technical level in the technologies that I handle and I am always learning what is new and needed in the IT market, in this field those who stop learning are left behind. in addition to generating code I always make sure it is clean, optimized and legible as possible, people say that I am a very happy and witty person so the laughs will never be lacking!

contact.t24: If you have an interesting and challenging project or you just want to communicate with me, do not hesitate and send me an email!

footer.t26: Developed by Mauricio Ocando with Tailwind CSS
